titleStmt.title: An Act of Common-Councell made the eleventh day of September, in the yeare of our Lord 1655. For the better avoiding and prevention of annoyances within the city of London, and liberties of the same.
titleStmt.author: City of London (England). Court of Common Council.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by James Flesher, printer to the honourable city of London,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
